author: allisonfromm
title: Roadmap to Creating a Legal Entity
description:
Entrepreneurs need a legal structure for tax & accounting and to raise VC funds. 
Tax and accounting professionals lack crypto experience.
solution: Document how to create a legal entity used for accounting, tax, and financial purposes for an entrepreneur being paid in ADA.
